Name: DemonPandemicVR
About the game: Our virtual reality exclusive, DemonPandemicVR, will satisfy your urge for a polished, casual VR experience. Built from the ground-up with comfort and casual players in mind, you can choose between a variety of options including your reload method of choice. Everything in DemonPandemicVR was made for VR, by VR experts. DemonPandemicVR includes the following: - Singleplayer - 100+ Characters - Arcade and realism reloading - 7 arenas - Seated or standing mode - Variety of weapons - Throw in game objects to kill demons - Built for everyone (No bloodshed or NSFW)
